title: Can we talk about cavities?
body:
I'm 25 years old and today I noticed a tiny black spot with REALLY MINOR discomfort only when biting down
I realized that there is potential or it is a cavity in a minor stage... but it is nonetheless a cavity, 
The dentist will have to extract that part of my teeth and fill it up with porcelain. 

I in my 25 yrs of life have never had a cavity and somehow this happened. I feel like a failure, I've failed my little molar. 

How many cavities have you had? How do you feel about being fixed up?
Do you care about cavities?

My song for my molar :( RIP 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5anLPw0Efmo

{{champion:103}}
